tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Most friendly and understanding doctor. She cares for patient after treatment also she calls and ask whether der is pblm or not. Nove doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I used to be extremely fearful of dental procedures, but my experience at Dr. Mayuri’s Clinic has completely transformed my perspective. I recently underwent a root canal treatment, and to my surprise, it was both painless and satisfying. Dr. Mayuri and her team’s method of thoroughly explaining every step of the process, coupled with her serene and composed demeanour during the treatment, is truly commendable. Her patience and ability to put patients at ease made the entire experience much more bearable. I am profoundly grateful for her exceptional care and professionalism. Thank you, Dr. Mayuri.
reply_text:
Hi ,
Thank you so much for your kind words! We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience at our clinic. Dr. Mayuri and our team are committed to providing the best care for our patients without unnecessary treatments. We appreciate your trust and look forward to continuing to care for your family's dental needs.

Warm regards,  
Toothfix Dental Clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently had an implant surgery with Dr. Mayuri Jobanputra and it was  pleasant experience. The process was smooth and painless. Dr was knowledgeable with great  practical skills .She nicely explained the entire procedure , duration and sittings required along with detailing of expenses . She made sure I was comfortable  every step of the way. The staff was professional and welcoming, and the results are fantastic. Highly recommend Dr. Mayuri and Toothfix Dental clinic for anyone needing dental implants.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had recently undergone a surgery at ToothFix Dental Clinic for the removal of my wisdom tooth which was horizontal with almost the whole tooth under the surface of the gum.

It was a complicated surgery since it was very close to the nerve. Dr Mayuri successfully performed the surgery taking utmost care and with a lot of patience to ensure that the nerve is not bruised during the procedure. Even during the surgery she made sure that I am comfortable at each stage.

I am very thankful to Dr. Mayuri for having solved the issue of my impacted wisdom tooth which was giving me a lot of trouble for a long time.

Cheers,
Toothfix Dental Clinic

review:
My wife visited  to Dr Mayuri’s Dental clinic at Borivali.Shraddha had Many issues related with her tooth since last many years.She was very scared of visiting any  Dental clinic.
Its always difficult to visit any dental clinic ans we know why😃.
But We found our self very lucky that shraddhas all dental problems were solved by  dr mayuri with special care.I never thought that it would be so easily cured .our special thanks to dr mayuri and her Team for such a painless treatment.

We strongly recommend Dr Mayuris jobanputra .one of the best dr who treats patient very friendly.
Those who are scared of dentist please just visit Mayuris jobanputras clinic once if you have any issue .Believe us your pain will turn in to gain after she treats you…


Thank you Doctor thanks a lot..🙏😇🙏…

Regards,
Mr Kinjal Thakkar.
